lead_paragraph: The founder of Bikram yoga has been ordered to pay nearly $6.5 million in a lawsuit that said he had sexually harassed and wrongfully fired an adviser.

headline.print_headline: California: $6.5 Million Judgment Against Founder of Bikram Yoga
headline.main: California: $6.5. Million Judgment Against Founder of Bikram Yoga

snippet: The founder of Bikram yoga has been ordered to pay nearly $6.5 million in a lawsuit that said he had sexually harassed and wrongfully fired an adviser.
abstract: Los Angeles jury orders Bikram Choudhury, founder of Bikram yoga, to pay $6.5 million in sexual harassment and wrongful dismissal lawsuit filed by former legal adviser Minakshi Jafa-Bodden; Choudhury has also been sued by six other women for sexual assault.
